text:
Company: Cook, Pitts and Saunders

Job Title: Webform Team Member

Job Description:
We are seeking a skilled webform team member to join our dynamic team. As a key player, you will be responsible for designing, developing, and deploying webforms that meet our clients' needs. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in web development, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to work independently to drive results.

Responsibilities:

 Design, develop, and deploy webforms using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless integration of webforms
 Troubleshoot and resolve technical issues in a timely manner
 Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices

Qualifications and Experience:

 2+ years of experience in web development
 Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
 Experience with webform development frameworks (e.g. React, Angular)
 Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
 Ability to work independently and drive results

Perks and Benefits:
We are committed to fair and equitable pay practices. The salary for this position ranges from $60,000 to $80,000 USD, based on your experience and skills. We also offer a comprehensive benefits package, including medical, dental, and vision insurance, 401(k) matching, and a generous PTO policy.
